SEARCH
Package withArrayList

Class Account

java.lang.Object
withArrayList.Account
public class Account extends Object
The homework1.Account Class implements account object. homework1.Account objects holds unique account id, unique username, birthdate, location, post-message-follower-following-block arrays, current status homework1.Account objects can like - comment post whose owner followed, follow - block - send message to, another account object, following by another account object,
Since:
2023-03-17

    • Account

      public Account(int accountId, String username, String birthdate, String location, ArrayList<Account> accounts) throws Exception
      Constructor of homework1.Comment class
      Parameters:
      accountId - INT unique id for each account object
      username - STRING unique username of account object
      birthdate - STRING birthdate of account
      location - STRING location of account
      accounts - ACCOUNT ARRAY all created account objects
      Throws:
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • blockUsername

      public int blockUsername(ArrayList<Account> accounts, String blockedUsername)
      blockUsername function block account object if available also unfollow two sides
      Parameters:
      accounts - ACCOUNT ARRAY which holds all created account objects.
      blockedUsername - STRING that blocked
      Returns:
      INT -1 no account find with given username, 1 blocked successfully

    • unBlockUsername

      Parameters:

      blockedUsername - STRING that unblocked
      Returns:
      INT -1 no account find with given username, 1 blocked successfully

      viewedProfileUsername - STRING username that will be viewed
